## RemirrorThemeProviderProps.theme property

The theme being passed into the context.

This can either be an object or a function that takes the currentTheme or a default theme when this is the root as the only parameter. It must return a valid `RemirrorTheme`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
theme: Partial<RemirrorTheme> | ((currentTheme: RemirrorTheme) => RemirrorTheme);
```
